name: Songbird - Metadata Editor - Remove Cancel Button
description:
Only displays the "OK" button when you make a change to Metadata Editor.

The order Footer buttons are backwards... this style fixes the problem by hiding the Cancel button.

You can easily just click [X], or escape on your keyboard, and this is a bug with the editor... 
Default buttons are OKAY CANCEL, but Songbird uses CANCEL OK, which really makes it hard to save the track details.

Program Versions:
+ Songbird

Also Try out:
+ Style 11998


Changelog:
- Initial Release
css:
/*
 __________________________________________________________________________
|                  |                                                       |
|          Title:  |  Songbird - Metadata Editor - Remove Cancel Button    |
|    Description:  |  Removes the Cancel Button from being in wrong place  |
|         Author:  |  -=Ben=-                                              |
|   Date Created:  |  January 20, 2009                                     |
|   Date Updated:  |  January 20, 2009                                     |
|        Version:  |  1.0.0.0                                              |
|__________________|_______________________________________________________|

*/



#track_editor #cancel_button
{
  display:none !important;
}
